data.description: Interface for Linux's VServer Context Patch
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's an interface module for setup and maintanance of linux
    vservers based on the vserver patches available at
    http://www.solucorp.qc.ca/miscprj/s_context.hc and
    http://www.13thfloor.at/VServer/.

    It's a modular rewrite of the shellscripts shipped with the vserver
    package (http://packages.debian.org/unstable/base/vserver.html)
